overview: Together again for their second year of college, Jeremy and Derrick recount their recent experiences. Follow our hot, horny sophomores as they journey through semester encounters with a doctor, a drafting instructor, two guards and a thief, a plumber, a tutor and a student, a wild mountain boy, and an unseen student observer.
tagline: Until you've seen the second part, you haven't seen the best part!
title: The Class of '84, Part II
